message.body: The beer bus is sold out and I noticed they raised the price this year. How do you get to the game when not taking the beer bus?
You can take the train or drive. If you take the train its the Wilmington line and there is a bus that takes you right to the stadium from that station
The Chester station, that is
Ok I think Chris and I will try the train, thanks for the tickets and the info!
No problem, the train isn't a terrible way to get there its just that sometimes you have to wait a bit before the train arrives after the game is over
Ok thanks. Also the gaze broadsheets are printed so if you know anyone overseas or in the states that would want to distribute them for us email pageant or post info on the google group
Ok, I'll think about it and see if i can come up with something
And if u are helping with the gong performance at the moris arboretum on the 4th of April you will need to make a mask
Well u don't have to maybe just some sort of costume
That's funny because i recently made three masks
Everyone else is making masks
Bring them
I made them and i didn't even know what I'd do with then
Perfect!
Notify the group u have them on the google group if you get a chance
Ok, I'll post that soon
We also have a kyz group show at pageant at the end of April so we need to get working on stuff for that at the gallery ASAP
Alright, do you know when i should be there to work on things?
Anytime u want, just contact Daniel
Ok
Really tho u could work there all the time if you want
There are tons of materials there
That's good to know
Ok letme know when I should head over
Sorry that was for Chris
Ah ok
Do the union play in the rain or do they cancel the game?
They play in the rain, they only cancel for lightening
Chris canceled on me and I don't think I want to go sit in the rain alone today
